title: PhD Stipend Extension for Family Crisis
description: A PhD student's stipend is expiring in one month, necessitating an urgent 3-month extension due to a sudden, critical illness of their father. This request is driven by the temporary need for the student to provide crucial financial support to their family while also striving to maintain uninterrupted academic progress on their dissertation research, requiring a heartfelt and professionally committed appeal to their supervisor.
userTask: I am a phd student and while my stipend will expire in 1 month, I want to write an email to my supervisor to ask for a 3-month extension because my father got ill and I temprarly need more funding to support my family
